Unmount all of them 

grep -p nfs /etc/filesystems | grep : | sed "s;:;;g" | sort -r | xargs -n1 umount -f

Mount all of them 

grep -p nfs /etc/filesystems | grep : | sed "s;:;;g" | sort | xargs -n1 mount

Check read check on all of them 

 for fs in $(grep -p nfs /etc/filesystems | grep : | sed "s;:;;g")
 do
 ls -l $fs
 echo "Press a key..."
 read
 done
